TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeViewAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the action that raised a event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by members such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=fullName> event and the TreeViewAction enumeration. To run the example paste the following code in a form containing a TreeView control named TreeView1. This example assumes TreeView1 is populated with items and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=fullName> event is connected to the event-handling method defined in the sample.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.t_45_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.t_45_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.t_45_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction ByKeyboard = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The event was caused by a keystroke.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction ByMouse = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The event was caused by a mouse operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction Collapse = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The event was caused by the collapsing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction Expand = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The event was caused by the expanding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The action that caused the event is unknown.
